alert.description: 【Note】When purchasing JPYC, please enter your ETH address from your "personal wallet" address, not your "exchange address". You can learn how to create your own wallet from

footer.PaymentServicesAct: Indication based on Payment Services Act
footer.SpecifiedCommercialTransactionAct: Indication based on Specified Commerial Transaction Act

innerArea.subText: Anyone can now easily purchase "JPYC", the Japanese Yen Stablecoin, in Japanese yen.

first.mainText: The First Japanese Yen Stablecoin in Japan
first.subText: JPYC (JPYCoin) is the first Japanese Yen Stablecoin in Japan utilizing blockchain technology (ERC20). It runs on the Ethereum mainnet and can be used to buy and sell goods at 1 JPYC = 1 yen at all times.It can be used as a Japanese Yen denominated coin in your wallet, such as Metamask, or in the secondary distribution market, such as Uniswap.

second.subText: JPYC is a currency-denominated asset that can be purchased and used at any time at a rate of 1 JPYC = 1 yen, and is a Prepaid Payment Instrument for Own Business under the Payment Services Act. It is not a crypto asset. On the other hand, it can be used for transactions on Ethereum (Mainnet) and other platforms* because it adopts ERC20, the standard for Ethereum.

mainText.second: it can support a variety of products.

community.subText: JPYC is a community of individuals and companies with great ideas and the ability to take action, working together to develop and expand the token ecosystem from Japan. Why don't you join the JPYC community to give shape to your ideas?

useArea.subText: JPYC always allows you to enjoy trading with goods at 1 JPYC = 1 yen.
useArea.useHelpText: * We do not support proxy purchases that require a license, such as alcohol.

grant.subText: JPYC Grant provides up to 1,000,000 JPYC to individuals and corporations based on their contribution to the ecosystem. Please fill out the form with the requested information to begin the JPYC Grant review process.

first.title: For the Public
first.mainText: Is there anything you need help with?
first.subText: JPYC is the first of its kind in Japan, and you may have a number of questions, but we're here to help. About the frequently asked questions, please wait a little longer, as we will summarize in the FAQ.

second.title: For Corporations
second.mainText: Why not accelerate your business wit JPYC?
second.subText: JPYC is an ERC20 prepaid coin that has been legally issued. It is expected to improve financial health and attract new users through blockchain-based payments and blockchain.

swapICB.mainText: About the Exchange of JPYC and ICB
swapICB.subText: JPYC and ICB can be exchanged in the ratio of 1 JPYC = 1 ICB, and those who already have ICB can exchange it to JPYC, though only the gas fee will be charged.

tax.mainText: Our Tax Accountants Familiar with Crypto Assets and JPYC

first.name: Hironori Ido
first.description: Director of Quantum Accounting, inc. He has signed advisory contracts with several venture companies, and provides advisory services in accounting and taxation, and also examines the accounting and taxation of crypto assets on a daily basis. He has also started to deal with paying taxes with crypto assets.

second.name: Ota Yohei
second.description: Engaged in auditing and M&A related business at a major audit firm. After that, he worked at REVIC (Regional Economic Revitalization Initiative Corporation), a public-private fund, where he was involved in supporting the revitalization of small and medium-sized companies. Currently, he is an independent consultant and advisor to a blockchain venture. He continues to conduct research while owning crypto assets, and can provide support from the perspective of individual investors and companies owning crypto assets.

wanted.mainText: We are looking for a tax accountant who is familiar with tax payment in JPYC

right.first: - In principle, JPYC will not be refunded.
right.second: However, this shall not apply in the event that the Company terminates (discontinues) the provision of the paid point service. In this case, the JPYC remaining in effect at the time of the refund will be refunded in Japanese yen, calculated on the basis of 1 JPYC = 1 yen.
right.third: - The secondary distribution price per JPYC may fluctuate due to the influence of exchange rates and economic conditions.

law.mainText: Indication based on Specified Commerial Transaction Act

right.first: Weekday, 10:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m. (except for year-end and New Year Holidays)
right.second: *Please contact us by email if your inquiry is outside of this.*

ninth.right: As long as this website is visible.

eleventh.left: Required Fees other than the Product Price

twelfth.left: About the Amount to be Paid

right.second: You will be asked to pay the listed price and bank transfer fee.
right.third: *We do not charge a GAS fee (transaction fee) when sending JPYC to our customers.*
right.fourth: *JPYC is exempt from taxation because it is a Prepaid Payment Instrument.*

thirteenth.right: After confirming the payment of the customers, we will remit the funds to your designated ETH address by the next business day.
